attributes.action: Special leave for keyworkers during childcare closure due to Covid.
attributes.additional_details:
Keyworkers both nhs and others have played and all still playing a crucial role in  helping us fight this pandemic, also will continue doing so in future.
School/childcare closure due to Covid is a situation when the keyworkers need help. It is extremely unfair that they are having to take annual leave and unpaid leave in this situation.
attributes.background: At the moment nhs has been asking the staffs to take their annual leave or take unpaid leave for school or nursery closure due to Covid.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for employers.

You could start a petition calling for the Government to extend the furlough scheme for people who cannot work due to childcare requirements, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
